column4: trying to get ssh working but can only log into my own machine?
what are you trying to do?
so you need a functional networking (IP config and ROUTING)
as ssh works over tcp/ip this must work. is that functional?
so you can ping both machines vice versa?
ok...so....you want to have access von box a to box b and from b to box a? or just one way?
the laptop pings desktop but not other way round
its like with building a house...you dont start with the roof....
